content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 6 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday said that a process of revisionism put into motion by the Hindu extremists had become a living nightmare for Indian Muslims and other minorities.
On his Twitter handle, the prime minister referred to the 30th anniversary of the demolition of historic Babri Mosque which was razed to the ground by the Hindu zealots in Ayodhya, India during 1992.
The prime minister urged the world community to take note of the rising religious hatred in India.
